activity_tracker_instance_name.name: activity_tracker_instance_name
activity_tracker_instance_name.description: The name of the Activity Tracker instance to create. Defaults to 'activity-tracker-<region>'

activity_tracker_manager_key_name.name: activity_tracker_manager_key_name
activity_tracker_manager_key_name.description: The name to give the Activity Tracker manager key.

activity_tracker_plan.name: activity_tracker_plan
activity_tracker_plan.description: The Activity Tracker plan to provision. Available: lite, 7-day, 14-day, 30-day, hipaa-30-day

activity_tracker_tags.name: activity_tracker_tags
activity_tracker_tags.description: Tags associated with the Activity Tracker instance (Optional, array of strings).

cos_endpoint.name: cos_endpoint
cos_endpoint.type:
list(object({
    endpoint                   = string
    bucket_name                = string
    target_crn                 = string
    api_key                    = string
    service_to_service_enabled = bool
  }))
cos_endpoint.description: (Optional, List) Property values for a Cloud Object Storage Endpoint.

cos_route_name.name: cos_route_name
cos_route_name.description: (Required, String) The name of the COS route.

cos_target_name.name: cos_target_name
cos_target_name.description: (Required, String) The name of the COS target.

default_targets.name: default_targets
default_targets.description: (Optional, List) The target ID List. In the event that no routing rule causes the event to be sent to a target, these targets will receive the event.

enable_platform_logs.name: enable_platform_logs
enable_platform_logs.description: Receive platform logs in the provisioned IBM Cloud Logging instance.

enable_platform_metrics.name: enable_platform_metrics
enable_platform_metrics.description: Receive platform metrics in the provisioned IBM Cloud Monitoring instance.

eventstreams_endpoint.name: eventstreams_endpoint
eventstreams_endpoint.description: (List) Property values for Event streams Endpoint

eventstreams_route_name.name: eventstreams_route_name
eventstreams_route_name.description: (Required, String) The name of the Event Streams route.

eventstreams_target_name.name: eventstreams_target_name
eventstreams_target_name.description: (Required, String) The name of the logDNA target.

logdna_endpoint.name: logdna_endpoint
logdna_endpoint.description: (Optional, List) Property values for a LogDNA Endpoint.

logdna_instance_name.name: logdna_instance_name
logdna_instance_name.description: The name of the IBM Cloud Logging instance to create. Defaults to 'logdna-<region>'

logdna_manager_key_name.name: logdna_manager_key_name
logdna_manager_key_name.description: The name to give the IBM Cloud Logging manager key.

logdna_plan.name: logdna_plan
logdna_plan.description: The IBM Cloud Logging plan to provision. Available: lite, 7-day, 14-day, 30-day, hipaa-30-day

logdna_provision.name: logdna_provision
logdna_provision.description: Provision an IBM Cloud Logging instance?

logdna_route_name.name: logdna_route_name
logdna_route_name.description: (Required, String) The name of the LogDNA route.

logdna_tags.name: logdna_tags
logdna_tags.description: Tags associated with the IBM Cloud Logging instance (Optional, array of strings).

logdna_target_name.name: logdna_target_name
logdna_target_name.description: (Required, String) The name of the logDNA target.

metadata_region_backup.name: metadata_region_backup
metadata_region_backup.description: (Optional, String) To store all your meta data in a backup region.

metadata_region_primary.name: metadata_region_primary
metadata_region_primary.description: (Required, String) To store all your meta data in a single region.

permitted_target_regions.name: permitted_target_regions
permitted_target_regions.description: (Optional, List) If present then only these regions may be used to define a target.

private_api_endpoint_only.name: private_api_endpoint_only
private_api_endpoint_only.description: (Required, Boolean) If you set this true then you cannot access api through public network.

region.name: region
region.description: The IBM Cloud region where instances will be created.

regions_target_cos.name: regions_target_cos
regions_target_cos.description: Route the events generated in regions to COS

regions_target_eventstreams.name: regions_target_eventstreams
regions_target_eventstreams.description: Route the events generated in regions to Event Streams

regions_target_logdna.name: regions_target_logdna
regions_target_logdna.description: Route the events generated in regions to LogDNA

resource_group_id.name: resource_group_id
resource_group_id.description: The id of the IBM Cloud resource group where the instance(s) will be created.

sysdig_instance_name.name: sysdig_instance_name
sysdig_instance_name.description: The name of the IBM Cloud Monitoring instance to create. Defaults to 'sysdig-<region>'

sysdig_manager_key_name.name: sysdig_manager_key_name
sysdig_manager_key_name.description: The name to give the IBM Cloud Monitoring manager key.

sysdig_plan.name: sysdig_plan
sysdig_plan.description: The IBM Cloud Monitoring plan to provision. Available: lite, graduated-tier, graduated-tier-sysdig-secure-plus-monitor

sysdig_tags.name: sysdig_tags
sysdig_tags.description: Tags associated with the IBM Cloud Monitoring instance (Optional, array of strings).

activity_tracker_crn.description: The id of the provisioned Activity Tracker instance.

activity_tracker_guid.description: The guid of the provisioned Activity Tracker instance.

activity_tracker_name.description: The name of the provisioned Activity Tracker instance.

activity_tracker_resource_key.description: The resource/service key for agents to use

logdna_crn.description: The id of the provisioned LogDNA instance.

logdna_guid.description: The guid of the provisioned LogDNA instance.

logdna_name.description: The name of the provisioned LogDNA instance.

logdna_resource_group_id.description: The resource group where LogDNA instance resides

logdna_resource_key.description: LogDNA service key for agents to use

sysdig_access_key.name: sysdig_access_key
sysdig_access_key.description: Sysdig access key for agents to use

sysdig_crn.name: sysdig_crn
sysdig_crn.description: The id of the provisioned Sysdig instance.
